verses.verse: Thus <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H7999>finished:<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in all the things that <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H25>father<s%> had <S%H6944>dedicated;<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments,<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> he among the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H5927>bring<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1958>which<s%> is <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

Why <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves to the <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> was in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And they <S%H5927>brought<s%> up the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were in the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> these did the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5927>bring<s%> up.

Also <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> to him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> could not be <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to his <S%H4725>place,<s%> to the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, even <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim:<s%>

For the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> forth their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof <S%H4605>above.<s%>

And they <S%H748>drew<s%> out the <S%H905>staves<s%> of the ark, that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>staves<s%> were <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1687>oracle;<s%> but they were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>without.<s%> And <S%H8033>there<s%> it is to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

There was <S%H369>nothing<s%> in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7535>save<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> therein at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> were <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> (for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> were <S%H6942>sanctified,<s%> and did not then <S%H8104>wait<s%> by <S%H4256>course:<s%>

Also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> which were the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> of <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> with their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> being <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> in white <S%H948>linen,<s%> having <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> and <S%H3658>harps,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H4217>east<s%> end of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and with them an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2690>sounding<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets:<s%>)

It <S%H1961>came<s%> even to pass, as the <S%H2689>trumpeters<s%> and <S%H7891>singers<s%> were as <S%H259>one,<s%> to make <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H1984>praising<s%> and <S%H3034>thanking<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and when they <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voice<s%> with the trumpets and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music,<s%> and <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> saying, For he is <S%H2896>good;<s%> for his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> that then the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%>

So that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud:<s%> for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
